main event: Several unidentified objects were observed in Milan, Michigan, exhibiting acceleration and deceleration with a white-ish glow or haze around them for 2-3 minutes.
interesting points: The objects were described as round and flat with a bulge on top,Approximately 50 feet in diameter,Observers reported a whistling sound when the objects accelerated,Car radios went dead during sightings,The conclusion of the report stated there was insufficient data to determine the identity of the objects.
sighted object: Unidentified round, flat objects with lights around the base
witness description: A civilian and a police officer considered reliable
